mapper.insert: INSERT INTO topic_submission (title, description, file_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{fileId})
mapper.update: UPDATE topic_submission SET review_opinion = #{reviewOpinion}, review_status = 1 WHERE topic_id = #{topicId}
UPDATE topic_submission SET leader_opinion = #{leaderOpinion}, leader_status = 1 WHERE topic_id = #{topicId}
mapper.select: SELECT topic_id, title, description, t.file_id, review_opinion, review_status, leader_opinion, leader_status FROM topic_submission t LEFT JOIN file on t.file_id = file.file_id WHERE file.owner_id = #{studentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO opening_report (opening_name, description, file_id) VALUES (#{openingName}, #{description}, #{fileId})
mapper.update: UPDATE opening_report SET review_opinion = #{reviewOpinion}, review_status = 1 WHERE report_id = #{reportId}
mapper.select: SELECT report_id, opening_name, description, o.file_id, review_opinion, review_status FROM opening_report o LEFT JOIN file on o.file_id = file.file_id WHERE file.owner_id = #{studentId}
